EmailTemplate.name: 2018 - EMEAI HON Operators Conference.201801_EMEAI_Followup_HONOperatorsConf_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending the 2018 Honeywell Operators Conference in Prague!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> THANK YOU FOR ATTENDING! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for attending the 2018 Honeywell Operators Conference in Prague.
The conference presentation is available now. Please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/HON_Operators_Conference_Prague_2018.pdf]]> to download.
To help us improve our future conferences, please take a few moments to give us some feedback by completing the brief online survey. Your feedback is very important to us.
COMPLETE THE SURVEY <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/W3G5P7S]]>
We look forward to hearing from you.
Thank you, Anna Tomova Customer Support Manager
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/u/TbZQj0h0o000BIu20qjdGX0]]>
